no.motif.types

Interface Repeatable<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Elements<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PreparedIterable

    public interface Repeatable<T>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Repeatable<T> repeat(int times)
      Repeat the contained elements a given amount of times.

    • Method Detail

      • repeat

        Repeatable<T> repeat(int times)
        Repeat the contained elements a given amount of times.
        • [].repeat(x) == []
        • Xs.repeat(0) == []
        • Xs.repeat(1) == Xs
        • [x, y].repeat(3) == [x, y, x, y, x, y]
        • [x, y].repeat(-1) throws IllegalArgumentException (eventually)
        Parameters:
        times - The amount to repeat.
        Returns:
        The elements, repeated the given amount of times.
